questions.question: Tell me about yourself.
questions.answer: I’m a dedicated student passionate about learning and exploring new technologies. I aim to build a successful career where I can contribute and grow..

questions.question: Why do you want to work for our company?
questions.answer: I want to start my career with a reputed organization like yours where I can learn, contribute, and grow while being part of a dynamic team..

questions.question: Describe a challenge you faced and how you overcame it.
questions.answer: I once struggled with meeting a project deadline, so I planned my tasks better and managed my time efficiently to complete it successfully.

questions.question: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
questions.answer: I’m strong in communication and teamwork. I sometimes take longer on details, but I’m improving by managing time and focusing on prioritiesg.

questions.question: Where do you see yourself in five years?
questions.answer: In five years, I see myself as a skilled professional contributing significantly to the company’s growth. I also aim to keep learning and advancing in my career.
